snippet: The visit to Istanbul by Ismail Haniya, the prime minister of Gaza, is his first official trip abroad since Hamas took over the Gaza Strip in 2007.
abstract: Hamas Prime Min Ismail Haniya of Gaza visits Istanbul in his first official trip abroad since his Islamist movement took over the Palestinian strip in 2007; seeks to strengthen ties with the Arab and Muslim world in wake of regional uprisings that gave rise to Islamist political strength.

byline.original: By SEBNEM ARSU and ETHAN BRONNER
byline.contributor: Sebnem Arsu reported from Istanbul and Ethan Bronner from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: The visit to Istanbul by Ismail Haniya, the prime minister of Gaza, is his first official trip abroad since Hamas took over the Gaza Strip in 2007.

headline.seo: Ismail Haniya of Gaza Visits Turkey
headline.main: Gaza Premier in Turkey, in First Official Trip Abroad
headline.print_headline: Gaza Premier in Turkey, in First Official Trip Abroad
